transcript:
Customer: Pain maine kab gaya kiya aapka?

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan sir madam.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Main ye bol raha tha wo cheez solve ho gayi jab aapne nahi main aur dekha nahi jo hoga dekha jayega bol ke.
Executive: Achcha ho gaya nahi kuch madam GST pe purchase kara aapne?
Customer: Haan GST mein hi hai.
Executive: GST purchase kacha bill kuch nahi hona chahiye GST purchase mein koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi hum log ka kuch kacha bill nahi hai. Laptop aapka jo hai nahi chal raha tha ek baar ek hi laptop hai.
Customer: Laptop aa gaya aapka?
Executive: Haan ji ji.
Customer: Laptop aa gaya laptop?
Executive: Haan nahi abhi to nahi actually hum log ka exam chal raha hai na main aadha ghante ke baad ho payega.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai call kar lijiyega main ghar mein aaunga.
Executive: Haan haan. Main number hai na aapke paas six wala. Jis WhatsApp pe message kiya tha na.
Customer: Ek baar call kar dijiye haan.
Executive: WhatsApp pe jis pe message kiya tha na sir usi pe aap message kar lena theek hai. WhatsApp pe jis pe message kiya tha.
Customer:
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asks if the issue is resolved.

- Laptop not received due to ongoing exams.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed no issue with GST purchase.

- Executive asked to call after half an hour.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call after half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, laptop, purchase, delivery
